programme.title: Scouts Guide To The Zombie Apocalypse
programme.desc: Three boy scouts look forward to spending their last camping trip together. However, they soon have a more pressing need for their wilderness survival skills when their home town is overrun with the walking dead. Fortunately, a tough cocktail waitress is on hand to help the youngsters survive the zombie onslaught. Comedy horror, starring Tye Sheridan, Logan Miller and Joey Morgan.

programme.title: Four Corners
programme.desc: A 13-year-old boy raised in South Africa's Cape Flats gets caught up in a volatile subculture dominated by two rival gangs. Thriller, starring Brendon Daniels, Jezriel Skei and Lindiwe Matshikiza.

programme.title: Alex Zane's Cinecast
programme.desc: Alex Zane takes a look at the new films coming to Sky Cinema this month, highlighting all the biggest premieres and some of his personal favourites.

programme.title: Against the Wild 2: Survive the Serengeti
programme.desc: Two children and their dog must use all their skills to survive in the African bush after a plane crash. Adventure, starring Jeri Ryan, John Paul Ruttan and Ella Ballentine.

programme.title: Maya the Bee Movie
programme.desc: A curious young bee befriends a number of other insects, despite her hive's strict rules on not associating with outsiders. When some of the Queen bee's royal jelly is stolen, she is accused of the crime and needs the help of her friends to track down the real culprits. Animated adventure based on Waldemar Bonsels' children's book, with the voices of Coco Jack Gillies and Kodi Smit-McPhee.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Special
programme.desc: The making of the long-awaited horror comedy sequel, including interviews with Melissa McCarthy and the rest of the cast.

programme.title: McFarland, USA
programme.desc: A former American football coach takes a job at an underprivileged school with a mostly Hispanic student body, and finds he has a lot to learn about their lives. When he discovers many of his pupils have a talent for running, he forms an athletics team and leads them to glory. Fact-based drama, starring Kevin Costner and Ramiro Rodriguez.

programme.title: Against the Wild 2: Survive the Serengeti
programme.desc: Two children and their dog must use all their skills to survive in the African bush after a plane crash. Adventure, starring Jeri Ryan, John Paul Ruttan and Ella Ballentine.

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: A thief attempting to go straight is recruited by a scientist, who provides him with a suit that gives him the power to shrink. He must use his new skills to carry out a special mission - helping the inventor to steal back his miniaturisation technology from a ruthless businessman who intends to turn it into a deadly weapon. Superhero adventure, starring Paul Rudd, Michael Douglas and Evangeline Lilly.

programme.title: Burnt
programme.desc: An inventive chef's unconventional methods make him the toast of Paris, but his career is derailed by an alcohol and drugs-fuelled meltdown. An old friend offers him a second chance by hiring him to take over the kitchens of an exclusive London restaurant, but has a hard time keeping his acerbic nature in check. Drama, starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller, Daniel Bruhl, Emma Thompson and Uma Thurman.

programme.title: Swelter
programme.desc: Ten years after their casino heist, four escaped convicts trace their former partner to a desert town, where he is now a lawman with no memory of his criminal past. Drama, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Alfred Molina and Lennie James.

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond: Special
programme.desc: The making of the latest instalment in the sci-fi series, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto and Zoe Saldana.(n)

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: A teenager discovers to his horror that he is a werewolf, and flees for his life after his first transformation has terrible consequences. He makes his way to a remote town that provides a safe haven for the creatures, but his new home proves dangerous when a deadly rivalry develops with the pack leader. Horror, starring Lucas Till, Stephen McHattie and Jason Momoa.(n)

programme.title: Minions
programme.desc: Premiere. A race of strange, babbling yellow creatures has served the cause of evil throughout the history of the world. In the 1960s, three of these eternal henchmen get a job working for a criminal genius who is hatching a plot against the British crown - but while carrying out her orders, they uncover a threat to their whole species. Animated comedy, with the voices of Sandra Bullock, Pierre Coffin, Jon Hamm and Michael Keaton.(n)

programme.title: Top Five
programme.desc: A comedian-turned-movie star is desperate to reinvent himself as a serious actor, while also preparing for his wedding to a reality TV celebrity. He spends a day being interviewed by a journalist, and their time together forces him to reflect on his past and what he really wants out of life. Comedy, directed by and starring Chris Rock, with Rosario Dawson.

programme.title: One in the Chamber
programme.desc: An assassin gets involved in a gang war in Prague, and arranges things so he is being hired by both sides to kill their rivals. As he plays the two factions off against each other, he attracts the attention of a fellow hitman, and makes himself a target. Action thriller, with Dolph Lundgren, Cuba Gooding Jr and Claudia Bassols.

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: A bumbling secret agent becomes Britain's leading spy following the assassination of all the country's other espionage experts. Single-handedly he sets out to unmask a mysterious villain responsible for stealing the Crown Jewels - but no one is prepared to believe a sinister billionaire is the culprit. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, John Malkovich, Natalie Imbruglia and Ben Miller.

programme.title: The Legend of Longwood
programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Mickey Miller moves from New York to Ireland, where she discovers a link between herself and the 300-year-old legend of a mysterious knight who regularly haunts the sleepy village. But will it give her the power to save a previous herd of white horses? Magical family drama, starring Lucy Morton, Thekla Reuten, Fiona Glascott, Lorcan Cranitch and Miriam Margolyes.

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
programme.desc: Nightwatchman Larry notices that the living exhibits of his museum are behaving strangely. He discovers that the magical artefact that brings them to life is damaged, so he and his friends travel to London's Natural History Museum to find a way to restore it. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller, Rebel Wilson and Robin Williams in his final film role.

programme.title: Lego DC Comics Super Heroes: Justice League vs Bizarro League
programme.desc: Animated action-adventure, with the voices of Diedrich Bader and Nolan North. Superman and the Justice League team up with their Bizarro League counterparts to thwart Darkseid's attempt to conquer the galaxy.

programme.title: Step Up All In
programme.desc: A Miami street dancer faces a series of setbacks as he seeks his fortune in Hollywood. He assembles a team of dancers which prove successful in a reality TV contest broadcast from Las Vegas, but struggles to put aside old conflicts in the pursuit of his dreams. Fifth film in the dance drama series, starring Ryan Guzman and Briana Evigan.

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A gifted young scientist joins a secret project researching inter-dimensional travel, and return from a journey to another world granted superhuman powers. Their abilities make them the only hope for Earth's survival when a colleague who was lost on their expedition returns to wreak vengeance. Superhero adventure, starring Miles Teller, Michael B Jordan, Kate Mara and Jamie Bell.

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, a Los Angeles rescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey with his ex-wife across the state to try and rescue his daughter. Disaster movie, starring Dwayne Johnson and Carla Gugino.

programme.title: The Princess and the Frog
programme.desc: A hard-working New Orleans waitress meets an arrogant prince who has been turned into a frog by a magic spell. When she tries to break the enchantment by kissing him, she also ends up transformed into an amphibian, and together they go in search of the voodoo queen who can change them back. Disney animated musical fantasy, with the voices of Anika Noni Rose and Bruno Campos.

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
programme.desc: Nightwatchman Larry notices that the living exhibits of his museum are behaving strangely. He discovers that the magical artefact that brings them to life is damaged, so he and his friends travel to London's Natural History Museum to find a way to restore it. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller, Rebel Wilson and Robin Williams in his final film role.

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A gifted young scientist joins a secret project researching inter-dimensional travel, and return from a journey to another world granted superhuman powers. Their abilities make them the only hope for Earth's survival when a colleague who was lost on their expedition returns to wreak vengeance. Superhero adventure, starring Miles Teller, Michael B Jordan, Kate Mara and Jamie Bell.

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, a Los Angeles rescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey with his ex-wife across the state to try and rescue his daughter. Disaster movie, starring Dwayne Johnson and Carla Gugino.

programme.title: Entourage
programme.desc: Movie star Vincent Chase gets the chance of a lifetime when his former agent, now a studio executive, offers him the opportunity to direct and star in his latest picture. However, the project proves a troubled one, while his three best friends seek to exploit the situation to their own advantage. Comedy based on the TV series, starring Adrian Grenier, Kevin Connolly, Kevin Dillon and Jerry Ferrara.

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: Ageing recluse Oren turns his back on the outside world, while his neighbour Leah tries vainly to resurrect her singing career. When Oren's estranged son is imprisoned, he finds himself forced to look after his granddaughter and forms a connection with Leah as he seeks her help. Romantic comedy drama, with Michael Douglas and Diane Keaton.(n)

programme.title: Mean Machine
programme.desc: A disgraced soccer star jailed for assaulting two policemen is persuaded by the prison authorities to form a football team of inmates to take on the guards. Unfortunately, whipping his fellow prisoners into shape proves a tricky proposition. Comedy drama, starring Vinnie Jones, Jason Statham, David Hemmings and Jason Flemyng.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show 2016
programme.desc: Countdown of the biggest box office hits in Britain and America.(n)

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada
programme.desc: A woman with dreams of becoming a journalist takes a job as assistant to the editor of a prestigious fashion magazine - a position that should guarantee a bright future if she succeeds. Unfortunately, she has just signed up to work for the boss from hell, whose cruel personality and outrageous demands make her life a nightmare. Comedy drama, with Meryl Streep, Anne Hathaway, Stanley Tucci and Emily Blunt.(n)

programme.title: Annie
programme.desc: A businessman running for mayor of New York saves the life of an orphan, and invites her to live with him as a publicity stunt. The tycoon's cynical nature is chipped away at by the youngster's sunny disposition. Meanwhile, her cruel foster mother hatches a kidnapping plot. Musical remake, starring Quvenzhane Wallis, Jamie Foxx, Cameron Diaz and Rose Byrne.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show 2016
programme.desc: Countdown of the biggest box office hits in Britain and America.(n)

programme.title: Hot Pursuit
programme.desc: An uptight, accident prone police officer desperate to prove herself has to protect a gangster's widow who has agreed to give evidence against a drug lord. They end up forced to go on the run together, and are pursued across Texas by hitmen and corrupt cops. Crime comedy, starring Reese Witherspoon and Sofia Vergara.(n)

programme.title: Spectre
programme.desc: James Bond goes rogue after receiving a cryptic message that sets him on the trail of a secretive criminal network. While his colleagues face a new threat closer to home, Bond embarks on a globetrotting journey in search of the elusive mastermind behind the syndicate - whom he discovers may have links to his own past. Spy thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Christoph Waltz, Lea Seydoux and Ralph Fiennes.(n)

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: Anti-social ogre Shrek resolves to stop an evil ruler from banishing fairy-tale characters to his swampland home. However, the reluctant hero ends up forced to rescue the beautiful Princess Fiona from a castle guarded by a dragon, aided only by a wisecracking donkey. Animated comedy, with the voices of Mike Myers, John Lithgow, Cameron Diaz, Eddie Murphy and Vincent Cassel.(n)

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: A drifter in a post-apocalyptic wasteland encounters a crazed, sadistic warlord and his radiation-afflicted cult. He assists a warrior who has turned against the tyrant, and liberates five women who have been forced to become his brides. Together, they make a desperate journey through the desert to salvation, with their enemies in hot pursuit. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron.(n)

programme.title: Annie
programme.desc: A businessman running for mayor of New York saves the life of an orphan, and invites her to live with him as a publicity stunt. The tycoon's cynical nature is chipped away at by the youngster's sunny disposition. Meanwhile, her cruel foster mother hatches a kidnapping plot. Musical remake, starring Quvenzhane Wallis, Jamie Foxx, Cameron Diaz and Rose Byrne.(n)

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road

He assists a warrior who has turned against the tyrant, and liberates five women who have been forced to become his brides. Together, they make a desperate journey through the desert to salvation, with their enemies in hot pursuit. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron.(n)

programme.title: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut
programme.desc: The crusading grown-ups of the Colorado town lead America into war against Canada in a bid to eradicate bad language from TV. The four young heroes set out to bring peace to the world, but have to battle a fearsome alliance between Satan and Saddam Hussein. Animated musical comedy, with the voices of Trey Parker and Matt Stone, as well as George Clooney, Eric Idle and Isaac Hayes.

programme.title: White Men Can't Jump
programme.desc: A basketball hustler working Los Angeles' courts uses his goofy appearance to lull his opponents into a false sense of security. He forms an uneasy alliance with a fellow conman and rival to make a financial killing, but his debts soon catch up with both of them. Ron Shelton's comedy, starring Woody Harrelson, Wesley Snipes and Rosie Perez.

programme.title: The Pink Panther
programme.desc: The world's most inept police detective, Inspector Clouseau, heads off to Switzerland in search of a suave jewel thief who has purloined a priceless diamond from a princess - but the bumbling officer's every ruse to foil the crime ends in chaos, not least when he is framed for the robbery himself. Blake Edwards' comedy, starring Peter Sellers, David Niven, Capucine, Robert Wagner and Claudia Cardinale.

programme.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
programme.desc: Comedy mixing live action and animation, set in a 1940s Hollywood where cartoon characters are real. A seedy private eye with a hatred of `toons' reluctantly ends up helping to clear an animated rabbit accused of murdering his wife's human lover. Starring Bob Hoskins, Christopher Lloyd, Joanna Cassidy and Stubby Kaye, with voices supplied by Mel Blanc, Kathleen Turner and Charles Fleischer.

programme.title: Analyze That
programme.desc: A Mob boss pretends to have a nervous breakdown to get out of jail, and is promptly released into the custody of his psychiatrist, who is forced to provide the criminal with a place to stay. However, tired of their unwanted guest's slobbish ways, the doctor and his wife find him a job on a TV show - as a consultant with an unusual specialism. Comedy sequel, with Robert De Niro, Billy Crystal and Lisa Kudrow.

programme.title: Nine Months
programme.desc: A child psychologist's well-ordered world begins to fall apart when his live-in girlfriend announces she is pregnant. Not fond of children anyway, he dreads the impact a baby will make on his life - and to make matters worse, their eccentric Russian obstetrician admits he has never delivered a baby before. Romantic comedy, starring Hugh Grant, Julianne Moore, Jeff Goldblum, Joan Cusack and Tom Arnold, with Robin Williams in a cameo role.

programme.title: Norbit
programme.desc: A timid man's life is ruined after he is bullied into marrying an overbearing, overweight woman. However, a more hopeful future beckons when he bumps into his childhood sweetheart and realises she is his one true love - but first he has to pluck up the courage to confront his tyrannical wife. Comedy, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles alongside Thandie Newton, Cuba Gooding Jr and Terry Crews.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners 2
programme.desc: Awkward teenagers Will, Simon and Neil find university life does not live up to their expectations, and are insanely jealous of Jay's stories of his gap year in Australia. Heading Down Under to meet their friend, they inevitably discover he has exaggerated his escapades - so decide to go in search of a real adventure. Comedy sequel, starring Simon Bird, James Buckley, Joe Thomas and Blake Harrison.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: Dimwitted Rhode Island limousine driver Lloyd Christmas and his equally vacuous friend Harry Dunne embark on a disaster-fraught cross-country trip to Aspen, where they hope to reunite a briefcase with its female owner. However, the pair are unaware the case contains a $1million ransom they would have been better leaving well alone. Farrelly brothers comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Jeff Daniels, Lauren Holly, Teri Garr and Mike Starr.

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two teenage friends are on the brink of going to different colleges, so decide to mark the event by going to a party where they hope to lose their virginity. However, they have promised to supply the booze for the event, a task that proves much harder than expected because they are under age. Unfortunately, when a friend steps in to help, the situation gets even worse. Comedy, starring Jonah Hill, Michael Cera and Christopher Mintz-Plasse.

programme.title: Norbit
programme.desc: A timid man's life is ruined after he is bullied into marrying an overbearing, overweight woman. However, a more hopeful future beckons when he bumps into his childhood sweetheart and realises she is his one true love - but first he has to pluck up the courage to confront his tyrannical wife. Comedy, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles alongside Thandie Newton, Cuba Gooding Jr and Terry Crews.

Heading Down Under to meet their friend, they inevitably discover he has exaggerated his escapades - so decide to go in search of a real adventure. Comedy sequel, starring Simon Bird, James Buckley, Joe Thomas and Blake Harrison.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: Dimwitted Rhode Island limousine driver Lloyd Christmas and his equally vacuous friend Harry Dunne embark on a disaster-fraught cross-country trip to Aspen, where they hope to reunite a briefcase with its female owner. However, the pair are unaware the case contains a $1million ransom they would have been better leaving well alone. Farrelly brothers comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Jeff Daniels, Lauren Holly, Teri Garr and Mike Starr.

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: A man makes the mistake of engaging a cable TV installer in conversation in a ploy to get all the channels for free. However, the manic repairman shows an invincible determination to be his new best friend - and does not take kindly to rejection. Comedy directed by Ben Stiller, starring Jim Carrey, Matthew Broderick and George Segal.(n)

programme.title: Just Before I Go
programme.desc: After his wife leaves him, a troubled man plans to kill himself. Before doing so, he travels back to his hometown to settle some old scores and make amends with his friends and loved ones. While there, he begins to realise that perhaps life is worth living after all. Comedy drama, directed by Courteney Cox and starring Seann William Scott, Olivia Thirlby and Garret Dillahunt.(n)

programme.title: Death Becomes Her
programme.desc: Two romantic rivals are both granted the secret of eternal youth by a mysterious mystic. However, as they battle to get their claws into a plastic surgeon, they discover their now-immortal bodies are capable of taking whatever damage they can dish out. Black comedy fantasy, starring Goldie Hawn, Meryl Streep, Bruce Willis and Isabella Rossellini.(n)

programme.title: Calendar Girls
programme.desc: When her husband dies of leukaemia, a Women's Institute member is inspired to raise funds for the local hospital. Casting inhibitions and clothes aside, the widow and her daring friend encourage their fellow members to pose nude for a charity calendar, causing a stir in their Yorkshire village and beyond. Nigel Cole's fact-based comedy drama, starring Helen Mirren, Julie Walters, Annette Crosbie, Celia Imrie and Penelope Wilton.(n)

programme.title: Bad Bromance
programme.desc: Dan Landsman prepares to attend a high-school reunion, and hopes to make a good impression on people who never had any time for him in his teens. To that end, he tracks down a famous classmate to persuade him to attend - but is unprepared for the consequences of letting the celebrity into his life. Comedy, starring Jack Black and James Marsden.(n)

programme.title: The Interview
programme.desc: The presenter of a lowbrow TV show and his producer plan a trip to North Korea after landing an exclusive interview with dictator Kim Jong-un. Before setting off, they are recruited by the CIA to assassinate the politician - a task they are sorely underqualified to carry out. Controversial comedy, starring James Franco, Seth Rogen and Lizzy Caplan.(n)

programme.title: The Waterboy
programme.desc: An American football team's waterboy puts up with constant ridicule from the players. But one day his anger gets the better of him and he demonstrates an unexpected talent for tackling - so the coach gives him a chance to prove his worth on the pitch. However, he has to keep his blossoming sporting career a secret from his overprotective mother. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Kathy Bates, Henry Winkler and Fairuza Balk.(n)

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Aliens declare war on Earth having seen video games from the 1980s and interpreted them as a threat. Their attack comes in the form of deadly recreations of classic video games, so the US government recruits four former arcade champions to repel the attack. Sci-fi comedy, starring Adam Sandler and Peter Dinklage.(n)

programme.title: Spy - Extended Version
programme.desc: A deskbound CIA agent provides valuable background support for a dashing secret agent, but has never gone into action herself. Everything changes, when the spy mysteriously vanishes, and she leaps into action to take his place, infiltrating the inner circle of a ruthless arms dealer and trying to avert a global catastrophe. Comedy adventure, starring Melissa McCarthy, Jason Statham and Rose Byrne.(n)

programme.title: Bad Bromance
programme.desc: Dan Landsman prepares to attend a high-school reunion, and hopes to make a good impression on people who never had any time for him in his teens. To that end, he tracks down a famous classmate to persuade him to attend - but is unprepared for the consequences of letting the celebrity into his life. Comedy, starring Jack Black and James Marsden.(n)

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Aliens declare war on Earth having seen video games from the 1980s and interpreted them as a threat. Their attack comes in the form of deadly recreations of classic video games, so the US government recruits four former arcade champions to repel the attack. Sci-fi comedy, starring Adam Sandler and Peter Dinklage.(n)

Everything changes, when the spy mysteriously vanishes, and she leaps into action to take his place, infiltrating the inner circle of a ruthless arms dealer and trying to avert a global catastrophe. Comedy adventure, starring Melissa McCarthy, Jason Statham and Rose Byrne.(n)

programme.title: SWAT
programme.desc: A cop's career is seemingly over when he accidentally shoots a hostage while thwarting a bank robbery. He is given the chance to redeem himself by joining an elite unit headed by a veteran sergeant. Their mission is to escort an international crime lord in custody as he is taken to prison. However, they hit a snag when their prisoner offers a multimillion-dollar reward to anyone who breaks him out of jail, placing them under attack from every criminal in the city. Action thriller, starring Samuel L Jackson and Colin Farrell.

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: The daughter of retired special forces officer John Matrix is kidnapped by an old comrade-in-arms, now in league with a deposed former dictator. The tyrant plans to use the girl to force Matrix into assassinating the head of the country he once ruled, but is unprepared for the lengths to which the veteran soldier will go to rescue his child. Action adventure, with Arnold Schwarzenegger and Rae Dawn Chong.

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: The seaside resort of Amity is terrorised once again by a man-eating great white shark. While police chief Brody struggles to alert the townsfolk to the magnitude of the danger, a group of teenagers - including Brody's two sons - is adrift at sea in waters hunted by the shark. Thriller sequel, starring Roy Scheider, Lorraine Gary and Murray Hamilton.

programme.title: Jaws 3
programme.desc: A shark is captured by divers and put on display in a Florida marine centre, where it ultimately dies. However, examination of the body reveals the seemingly fully-grown shark was actually a baby - and its enormous, ferocious mother soon comes looking for it. Thriller sequel, originally released in cinemas in 3D, starring Dennis Quaid, Simon MacCorkindale, Louis Gossett Jr and Bess Armstrong.

programme.title: Bloodsport
programme.desc: A talented martial arts expert gets entangled with a tenacious undercover reporter as he takes part in an illegal fighting tournament, where the last man standing wins the day - and the losers usually end up in the cemetery. Action adventure, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Donald Gibb, Leah Ayres, Norman Burton and Roy Chiao.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: Cop John Anderton is forced to go on the run when a supposedly infallible trio of psychics foretell he is about to kill a man he has never heard of. Convinced their prediction is false, he kidnaps one of the so-called precogs to prove his innocence - and stumbles across a complex conspiracy. Steven Spielberg's futuristic thriller, starring Tom Cruise, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton and Max von Sydow.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ethan Hunt is called out of retirement when an ex-trainee is taken hostage by a ruthless arms dealer, but when the rescue operation goes wrong, the villain decides to target Hunt's fiancee. Action thriller sequel directed by JJ Abrams, starring Tom Cruise, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Michelle Monaghan, Ving Rhames and Simon Pegg.

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: The dying wife of a retired assassin leaves him a puppy, in the hope that having something to love will stop him returning to a life of violence when she is gone. When the son of a Russian gangster steals his car and kills the dog, the hitman is provoked into a murderous rage and slaughters his way through the underworld in search of revenge. Action thriller, starring Keanu Reeves and Willem Dafoe.

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: A former member of the US Army Special Forces returns to his home town, only to find the pleasant rural backwater he once loved has become a criminal haven. Determined to restore order, he sets out to take down those responsible for the town's decline. Action adventure remake of the cult 1973 film, starring Dwayne Johnson, Johnny Knoxville, Neal McDonough and Kristen Wilson.

programme.title: Into the Storm
programme.desc: A small town is unexpectedly ravaged by a series of devastating tornados. When it emerges that this was merely part of an even larger crisis, the townsfolk flee for their lives as scientists set out to monitor the event, while thrill-seekers risk their lives for the chance to experience a twister close-up. Disaster movie, starring Richard Armitage and Sarah Wayne Callies.

programme.title: Volcano: Fire on the Mountain
programme.desc: A geologist tries to convince residents of an idyllic ski community that a nearby volcano is about to erupt - a warning that falls on deaf ears until a deadly earthquake rocks the town. Disaster movie, starring Dan Cortese, Cynthia Gibb, Brian Kerwin and Don Davis.(n)

programme.title: Eight Legged Freaks
programme.desc: The residents of an Arizona mining town are forced to batten down the hatches and reach for the flame-throwers when a chemical waste spill causes hundreds of little spiders to mutate into gigantic flesh-eating monsters - and it is down to the local sheriff to help save the day. Comedy horror, starring David Arquette, Kari Wuhrer, Scarlett Johansson, Scott Terra and Doug E Doug.(n)

programme.title: Wild Wild West
programme.desc: A government agent teams up with a gadget-mad master of disguise to investigate the disappearance of several scientists. Their search leads them to an evil genius who is plotting to kill the US president with some bizarre inventions of his own. Sci-fi Western comedy, starring Will Smith, Kevin Kline, Kenneth Branagh, Salma Hayek and Ted Levine.(n)

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: A reporter discovers four humanoid amphibians who live in the sewers of New York, and use their martial arts skills to fight crime. She helps them as they face their toughest challenge yet - defeating a sinister criminal organisation that seems to have power over the entire city. Fantasy adventure, starring Megan Fox and William Fichtner, with the voice of Johnny Knoxville.(n)

programme.title: Terminator Genisys
programme.desc: A soldier fighting in a post-apocalyptic war against living machines is sent back in time to prevent an attempt to change the past - but when he arrives, he finds that history has been changed beyond recognition - and that a plot is being hatched by an unexpected enemy to destroy the future of the human race. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger and Emilia Clarke.(n)

programme.title: The Matrix
programme.desc: A computer hacker discovers the world around him is nothing more than a virtual-reality fantasy created by malevolent living machines. Entering the devastated real world, he joins freedom fighters risking their lives to bring the truth out into the open and liberate the human race. Sci-fi action thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss and Hugo Weaving.(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer
programme.desc: The super-powered team takes on a mysterious alien who has been sent by his planet-eating master to prepare Earth for obliteration. While the four heroes try to find a way to foil its plans, an old enemy returns, intent on seizing the extraterrestrial's power. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Ioan Gruffudd, Michael Chiklis, Chris Evans and Jessica Alba, with the voice of Laurence Fishburne.(n)

programme.title: Harry Potter Special"}, (?)
programme.desc: Rupert Grint introduces a preview of the fifth movie in the fantasy series, featuring footage from the film, interviews with the cast and director.(r)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince"}, (?)
programme.desc: The sixth in the blockbuster fantasy adventure series, starring Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint and Emma Watson. The ruthless Death Eaters announce the return of their master, Lord Voldemort, with a series of attacks on London. As disaster looms, Professor Dumbledore brings former tutor Horace Slughorn back to Hogwarts so that young wizard Harry Potter can learn from him the secrets of Voldemort's power.(r)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince Special"}, (?)
programme.desc: Alex Zane visit Hogwarts, where he talks to Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson and Rupert Grint - stars of the sixth Harry Potter movie.(r)

programme.title: Harry Potter Special"}, (?)
programme.desc: Rupert Grint introduces a preview of the fifth movie in the fantasy series, featuring footage from the film, interviews with the cast and director.(r)

programme.title: Harry Potter Special"}, (?)
programme.desc: Behind the scenes report on the first half of the fantasy movie saga's two-part conclusion.(r)

programme.title: Harry Potter Premiere Special"}, (?)
programme.desc: Alex Zane reports from the opening of the final film in the fantasy saga at London's Trafalgar Square, and interviews stars including Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson and Rupert Grint.(r)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2"}, (?)
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure, the final part of JK Rowling's epic saga, starring Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson and Rupert Grint. Harry continues his search for the magical Horcruxes, the key to the evil Lord Voldemort's immortality. Acting on information from the goblin Griphook, Harry is led to the vault of Voldemort's ally Bellatrix Lestrange before returning to Hogwart's for a final confrontation with his archenemy.

programme.title: Harry Potter Premiere Special"}, (?)
programme.desc: A look at moving moments from the premiere of the final Harry Potter film.(r)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone"}, (?)
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure starring Daniel Radcliffe. Harry Potter lives a miserable existence with his loathsome aunt and uncle. That is until he learns from a giant named Hagrid that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at the prestigious Hogwarts boarding school for wizards and soon embarks on a new life filled with magic and mystery.(r)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets"}, (?)
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure sequel to The Philosopher's Stone, starring Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint and Emma Watson. When Harry, Ron and Hermione return to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry for a new term, they discover a sinister message written in blood on a wall. Is it a sign that the dark forces of Lord Voldemort have infiltrated the school?.(r)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets: Behind the Scenes Special"}, (?)
programme.desc: Interviews with the cast of the second film in the fantasy series, plus a look at how the magical effects were created.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban"}, (?)
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure starring Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint and Emma Watson. With dangerous criminal Sirius Black on the run from Azkaban, Harry Potter begins his third year at Hogwarts surrounded by heightened security. But is Black the real threat, or is there someone even more deadly trying to get close to Harry?.(r)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire"}, (?)
programme.desc: The fourth instalment of J K Rowling's fantasy adventure franchise starring Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint, Emma Watson and Ralph Fiennes. It's schoolboy wizard Harry Potter's fourth year at Hogwarts and difficult times lie ahead. He's forced to risk his life after being mysteriously entered into the Triwizard Tournament in which representatives of three top schools compete in a series of dangerous tasks. But when tragedy strikes, Harry fears the worst. Could the evil Lord Voldemort really have returned?.(r)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix"}, (?)
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure starring Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint and Emma Watson. Despite having battled Voldemort in person, Harry Potter cannot convince the wizarding world of the evil lord's return. Inspired by his friends in the secret Order of the Phoenix, Harry forms an underground army at Hogwarts in preparation for battle with the forces of evil.(r)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince"} (?)

programme.desc: Fantasy adventure starring Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson and Rupert Grint. With Lord Voldemort once again in the ascendancy, teenage wizard Harry Potter and his friends Hermione and Ron are forced to go on the run. Armed with items given to them by headmaster Albus Dumbledore, they seek to destroy artefacts that contain the secret of Voldemort's power.(n)

programme.desc: Alex Zane presents a retrospective look at the making of the films in the fantasy series, including The Prisoner of Azkaban, The Half-Blood Prince and both parts of The Deathly Hallows. He also visits Leavesden Studios, where scenes involving key locations such as Hogwarts' Great Hall, Gryffindor Common Room, the Potions Classroom and the Ministry of Magic were filmed.(n)

programme.title: DuckTales the Movie: Treasure of the Lost Lamp
programme.desc: Scrooge McDuck and great-nephews Huey, Dewey and Louie lead an archaeological expedition to find a long-lost genie's lamp once belonging to a notorious bandit, but reckon without a villainous attempt to use its powers in a dastardly plot. Animated Disney adventure, with the voices of Christopher Lloyd, Alan Young and Russi Taylor.

programme.title: Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen
programme.desc: A New York teenager moves with her parents to a small town, where she quickly gets drawn into a bitter conflict with a local girl - until auditions for a musical give her the chance to outshine her rival. Meanwhile, she faces the challenge of working out how to get back to the big city for her favourite band's farewell concert. Drama, starring Lindsay Lohan, Adam Garcia, Glenne Headly and Alison Pill.

programme.title: Big Hero 6 Special
programme.desc: Alex Zane visits Disney studios to go behind the scenes of the animated adventure about a boy and his robot who join a team of superheroes.

programme.title: Freaky Friday
programme.desc: A mother and her rebellious teenage daughter's simultaneous wishes to trade places results in them magically switching bodies for a day and gaining an unforgettable insight into each other's lives. Disney fantasy comedy, with Jodie Foster, Barbara Harris, Patsy Kelly, John Astin, Charlene Tilton and Sorrell Booke.

programme.title: Cinderella III: A Twist in Time
programme.desc: Cinderella's wicked stepmother steals the Fairy Godmother's magic wand, enabling her to turn back time and ensure her stepdaughter does not attend Prince Charming's lavish ball. Cinderella's rodent pals Jaq and Gus help the distraught heroine to break the evil spell before it's too late. Disney's animated fantasy sequel, with the voices of Jennifer Hale, CD Barnes and Russi Taylor.

programme.title: Mars Needs Moms
programme.desc: A nine-year-old boy sees a spacecraft land and kidnap his mother. He stows away on board as the ship travels back to the aliens' Mars homeland. As he tries to rescue her, he learns the Martians have taken her because they need Earth mothers to raise their own children. Animated sci-fi adventure, with the voices of Seth Robert Dusky, Dan Fogler and Joan Cusack.

programme.title: Big Hero 6
programme.desc: A lonely, orphaned computer genius forms a special bond with an inflatable robot. When a devastating event occurs in their futuristic home city, they join forces with a group of friends to form a hi-tech group of heroes who are determined to get to the bottom of the matter. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Ryan Potter, Scott Adsit and Daniel Henney.

programme.title: The Little Mermaid
programme.desc: Underwater princess Ariel becomes bored with her aquatic existence and spends her time spying on humans, much to the annoyance of her father. Longing to live on land, she strikes a deal with a banished sea witch in order to become human and meet a prince - but there is a price to be paid. Disney's animated adventure, with the voices of Jodi Benson, Christopher Daniel Barnes and Rene Auberjonois.

programme.title: Tinker Bell and the Legend of the NeverBeast
programme.desc: One of Tinker Bell's friends meets a large hairy monster, and discovers he is not as fearsome as he looks. However, she has a hard time convincing the other fairies to accept him, and needs the help of her friends to protect the creature. Animated fantasy, with the voices of Mae Whitman, Ginnifer Goodwin and Rosario Dawson.

programme.title: Big Hero 6
programme.desc: A lonely, orphaned computer genius forms a special bond with an inflatable robot. When a devastating event occurs in their futuristic home city, they join forces with a group of friends to form a hi-tech group of heroes who are determined to get to the bottom of the matter. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Ryan Potter, Scott Adsit and Daniel Henney.

programme.title: A Bug's Life
programme.desc: Well-meaning ant Flik lands his colony in trouble when he accidentally disposes of an offering meant for a swarm of greedy grasshoppers - who promptly promise a horrible revenge. Faced with the imminent destruction of the anthill, he sets out to save the situation by enlisting the help of a few would-be heroes - an out-of-work troupe of bugs from a low-rent flea circus. Pixar animation, with the voices of Dave Foley, Kevin Spacey and Julia Louis-Dreyfus.

programme.title: Finding Pixar
programme.desc: Documentary about the animation studio.

programme.title: The Little Mermaid

Animated sci-fi adventure, with the voices of Seth Robert Dusky, Dan Fogler and Joan Cusack.

programme.title: The Black Cauldron
programme.desc: A pig farmer struggles to stop an evil king taking control of a supernatural cauldron with the power to grant immortality, and sets out to bring an end to the villain's reign of terror with a trusty band of friends. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of John Hurt, Grant Bardsley and Nigel Hawthorne.

programme.title: Escape to Witch Mountain
programme.desc: Two psychic children go on the run in an attempt to discover their true origin, hotly pursued by a wicked millionaire who wants to make use of their powers. A lonely widowed man helps them to escape, and leads them on a journey to a mountain where they believe their parents are waiting for them. Disney sci-fi adventure, starring Ray Milland, Donald Pleasence and Eddie Albert.

programme.title: Babes in Toyland
programme.desc: A scheming villain plans to disrupt the wedding of a piper's son by having him killed so he can marry the bride himself. But his henchmen sell the groom to gypsies, from whom he finally escapes to return and save the girl he loves from a forced marriage. Fantasy, starring Ray Bolger, Tommy Sands and Annette Funicello.(n)

programme.title: Mickey, Donald, Goofy: The Three Musketeers
programme.desc: Three cleaners dream of becoming musketeers - and unexpectedly get the chance to make their wish come true when they are made bodyguards to a princess. However, they do not realise the captain of the guard is plotting to kill her and has given them the job because he thinks they will fail. Animated adventure, with the voices of Wayne Allwine, Tony Anselmo, Bill Farmer and Russi Taylor.(n)

programme.title: Tinker Bell and the Legend of the NeverBeast
programme.desc: One of Tinker Bell's friends meets a large hairy monster, and discovers he is not as fearsome as he looks. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of John Hurt, Grant Bardsley and Nigel Hawthorne.(n)

programme.title: Meet the Robinsons
programme.desc: Orphaned child genius Lewis has an unexpected encounter with a boy who claims to be from the future. With some trepidation Lewis agrees to travel forward through time to meet his new friend's madcap family. However, a bowler-hatted villain threatens his chances of ever returning home. Animated adventure, with the voices of Angela Bassett, Daniel Hansen, Jordan Fry and Tom Selleck.(n)

programme.title: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day
programme.desc: An 11-year-old boy has a day where everything seems to go wrong, but gets no sympathy from his family. He becomes convinced that bad things only ever happen to him, but then his parents, his brother and his sister all suffer terrible days of their own. Family comedy based on Judith Viorst's series of children's books, starring Ed Oxenbould, Steve Carell and Jennifer Garner.(n)

programme.title: Cars 2
programme.desc: Racing car Lightning McQueen heads overseas to compete in an international grand prix, with events in Britain, Japan and Italy. He gets mixed up in international espionage when a case of mistaken identity leads to an encounter with two English spy cars searching for a powerful gadget. Pixar animated adventure sequel, with the voices of Owen Wilson and Michael Caine.(n)

programme.title: Old Dogs
programme.desc: An uptight PR executive on the verge of an important business deal discovers he is the father of seven-year-old twins, and that he will be responsible for looking after them while their mother spends two weeks in jail. Clueless about how to deal with children, he turns to his friend and business partner for help. Comedy, starring John Travolta, Robin Williams and Bernie Mac in his final role.(n)

programme.title: A Bug's Life
programme.desc: Well-meaning ant Flik lands his colony in trouble when he accidentally disposes of an offering meant for a swarm of greedy grasshoppers - who promptly promise a horrible revenge. Faced with the imminent destruction of the anthill, he sets out to save the situation by enlisting the help of a few would-be heroes - an out-of-work troupe of bugs from a low-rent flea circus. Pixar animation, with the voices of Dave Foley, Kevin Spacey and Julia Louis-Dreyfus.(n)

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: A battle-hardened military veteran fails to protect a government scientist from assassins. He is assigned to safeguard the dead boffin's family in case the killers come after the top-secret technology in his home, but finds looking after kids proves far tougher than taking on hitmen. Family comedy, starring Vin Diesel and Lauren Graham.(n)

programme.title: Cars 2
programme.desc: Racing car Lightning McQueen heads overseas to compete in an international grand prix, with events in Britain, Japan and Italy. Clueless about how to deal with children, he turns to his friend and business partner for help. Comedy, starring John Travolta, Robin Williams and Bernie Mac in his final role.(n)

programme.title: Tomorrowland: A World Beyond
programme.desc: A boy genius in the 1960s finds his way into a spectacular futuristic metropolis while attempting to promote his idea for a jetpack. Decades later, he has grown into a disillusioned adult, while a girl who has the talent and enthusiasm he has lost also finds her way into this strange new world, and together they attempt to uncover its secrets. Fantasy adventure, starring George Clooney, Britt Robertson and Hugh Laurie.(n)

programme.title: Remember the Titans
programme.desc: At the end of high-school segregation in the early 1970s, a black teacher struggles to deal with pressures on and off the pitch as he faces his first season as coach of the now racially integrated American football team. Fact-based drama, starring Denzel Washington, Will Patton, Wood Harris, Ryan Hurst, Nicole Ari Parker and Donald Faison.(n)

programme.title: Dr Dolittle 3
programme.desc: The talented vet's daughter with the same uncanny ability to talk to animals is staying at a ranch. When she learns financial problems will force the place to close, she comes up with an ingenious idea to solve the crisis by training the livestock for a rodeo and winning $50,000. Comedy sequel, starring Kyla Pratt, Kristen Wilson and John Amos.

programme.title: Spy Kids 3-D: Game Over
programme.desc: Young agent Juni has to go it alone when his big sister Carmen is kidnapped by the evil Toymaker, forcing the plucky junior spy to infiltrate the villain's virtual reality world to rescue her. Adventure sequel, starring Daryl Sabara, Alexa Vega, Sylvester Stallone, Antonio Banderas, Ricardo Montalban, George Clooney, Steve Buscemi, Salma Hayek and Elijah Wood.

programme.title: Dennis
programme.desc: A well-meaning little boy with an inability to stay out of trouble is the bane of his curmudgeonly neighbour, Mr Wilson. But when a thief steals Wilson's coin collection, the tiny terror seizes the chance to make amends and come to the rescue. Slapstick comedy based on the comic strip, starring Walter Matthau, Mason Gamble, Joan Plowright, Christopher Lloyd and Lea Thompson.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed
programme.desc: The amateur detectives attend the grand opening of a museum in their honour, featuring the costumes from all the fake monsters they exposed. The exhibits are stolen by a masked villain, who sets about re-creating all the gang's worst enemies. Comedy adventure sequel, starring Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard, Freddie Prinze Jr and Linda Cardellini.

programme.title: Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: Two unemployed executives decide to open a day-care centre, believing they have found an easy way to make a profit - but instead discover looking after a horde of rampant kids is not as simple as it seems. Family comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jeff Garlin, Steve Zahn and Anjelica Huston.

programme.title: Robots
programme.desc: Rodney the robot heads for the city, hoping to find an investor for his latest invention. Instead, he winds up clashing with an evil business mogul intent on stopping a manufacturer from making spare parts needed for ageing robots - so Rodney teams up with assorted rusty rejects to put the matter right. Animated adventure, with the voices of Ewan McGregor, Halle Berry, Robin Williams, Greg Kinnear and Amanda Bynes.

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Heroic flightless birds Skipper, Kowalski, Private and Rico uncover a plot to take over the world. Needing help to foil the evil scheme, they seek out a secret society of animal agents, led by a heroic wolf. Animated comedy spin-off, with the voices of Benedict Cumberbatch, John Malkovich and Tom McGrath.

programme.title: Into the Woods
programme.desc: A wicked witch agrees to lift a curse on a young couple if they will help restore her once beautiful looks. Based on Stephen Sondheim's hit stage musical, the plot also entwines the fairy tale stories of Cinderella, Little Red Riding Hood, Jack and the Beanstalk and Rapunzel. Musical fantasy, starring Meryl Streep, Johnny Depp, James Corden and Emily Blunt.

programme.title: The Mask of Zorro
programme.desc: The sword-wielding saviour of Spanish California returns after 20 years in prison, tutoring a thief to take over his heroic role and tackle corrupt government officials, who are using slave labour to mine gold illegally. Both mentor and pupil have personal scores to settle with their enemies, led by a ruthless governor and a psychotic military officer. Swashbuckling adventure, with Anthony Hopkins, Antonio Banderas and Catherine Zeta-Jones.

programme.title: Robots
programme.desc: Rodney the robot heads for the city, hoping to find an investor for his latest invention. Swashbuckling adventure, with Anthony Hopkins, Antonio Banderas and Catherine Zeta-Jones.

programme.title: Robot Overlords
programme.desc: In a world controlled by a robots, the human population is constantly monitored and is unable to venture outside. However, a boy manages to turn off his personal surveillance device, enabling him to begin a search for his long-lost father, who may hold the key to saving humanity. Family sci-fi adventure, starring Ben Kingsley, Gillian Anderson and Callan McAuliffe.(n)

programme.title: Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: Two unemployed executives decide to open a day-care centre, believing they have found an easy way to make a profit - but instead discover looking after a horde of rampant kids is not as simple as it seems. The exhibits are stolen by a masked villain, who sets about re-creating all the gang's worst enemies. Comedy adventure sequel, starring Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard, Freddie Prinze Jr and Linda Cardellini.(n)

programme.title: Ever After: A Cinderella Story
programme.desc: A girl grows up in 16th-century Europe under the iron fist of her stepmother, until the love of handsome Prince Henry offers a glimmer of hope. Unfortunately, the royal gent has worries of his own in the shape of an arranged marriage. Luckily, Renaissance genius Leonardo da Vinci is on hand to play fairy godfather and bring the pair together. Romantic drama, starring Drew Barrymore, Anjelica Huston, Dougray Scott and Timothy West.(n)

programme.title: Ice Age
programme.desc: Three mismatched prehistoric animals join forces to return a human infant to its tribe - but as their journey unfolds, the creatures fail to anticipate the many perils and pitfalls that lay in store for them. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of John Leguizamo, Ray Romano, Denis Leary, Goran Visnjic and Jack Black.(n)

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: An incompetent scientist finally invents something that works - a machine that turns water into food. When the device gets launched into the atmosphere, it has a strange effect on his town's weather, causing giant meals to fall from the sky to the delight of the residents - until it gets out of control. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan.(n)

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge out of Water
programme.desc: The cheery sea creature tries to prevent the precious secret formula from falling into the wrong hands - but when it goes missing, the end of the world approaches. SpongeBob and his friends embark on a quest to get it back, which leads to them developing superpowers and venturing onto dry land. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny and Antonio Banderas.(n)

programme.title: The Boxtrolls
programme.desc: The people of a small town live in fear of underground trolls, which they do not realise are actually harmless. A boy raised by the creatures must convince the townsfolk there is nothing to fear when a team of pest exterminators is hired to wipe out the friendly monsters. Stop-motion animated fantasy, with the voices of Isaac Hempstead Wright, Elle Fanning and Ben Kingsley.(n)

programme.title: Ice Age
programme.desc: Three mismatched prehistoric animals join forces to return a human infant to its tribe - but as their journey unfolds, the creatures fail to anticipate the many perils and pitfalls that lay in store for them. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of John Leguizamo, Ray Romano, Denis Leary, Goran Visnjic and Jack Black.(n)

A boy raised by the creatures must convince the townsfolk there is nothing to fear when a team of pest exterminators is hired to wipe out the friendly monsters. Stop-motion animated fantasy, with the voices of Isaac Hempstead Wright, Elle Fanning and Ben Kingsley.(n)

programme.title: Mrs Doubtfire
programme.desc: A struggling actor's ambitious, no-nonsense wife throws him out and demands a divorce. Desperate to spend time with his children, he puts his talents to good use by donning drag and posing as a Scottish housekeeper to get a job looking after them. Comedy, starring Robin Williams, Sally Field, Pierce Brosnan, Harvey Fierstein and Mara Wilson.(n)

programme.title: One of Our Dinosaurs Is Missing
programme.desc: Chinese secret agents try to get their hands on a stolen microfilm hidden in a dinosaur skeleton in London's Natural History Museum - but a group of indomitable nannies comes up with a plan to stop them getting hold of it by stealing the prehistoric remains. Disney family comedy, starring Peter Ustinov, Derek Nimmo, Joan Sims and Helen Hayes.(n)

programme.title: Play Misty for Me
programme.desc: A DJ has a one-night stand with an obsessive woman who repeatedly calls his station with the same song request. When he revives his relationship with an old flame, his unstable fan is driven mad with jealousy. Psychological thriller, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood, with Jessica Walter, Donna Mills, John Larch and James McEachin.

programme.title: Zulu
programme.desc: Two South African police officers, one black and one white, investigate the murder of a teenage girl. The case brings to light the lingering consequences of apartheid, and forces both men to face up to their own roles in their country's brutal history. Crime drama based on Caryl Ferey's novel, with Forest Whitaker and Orlando Bloom.

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.

programme.title: Deliver Us from Evil
programme.desc: A New York cop is baffled by a series of disturbing, inexplicable crimes sweeping the city. He discovers the terrifying truth behind the crimewave when he meets an unconventional priest, who seeks his help in stopping an outbreak of demonic possessions. Horror, starring Eric Bana, Edgar Ramirez and Olivia Munn.

programme.title: The Calling
programme.desc: A small-town cop with a drink problem discovers someone is mutilating and murdering people across her district. She realises that the serial killer is hiding a mysterious message inspired by ancient religious texts and becomes dangerously obsessed with deciphering its meaning. Crime thriller based on Inger Ash Wolfe's novel, starring Susan Sarandon and Donald Sutherland.

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: A veteran con man takes a young femme fatale under his wing, but dumps her when their relationship looks set to turn to love. Three years later, they cross paths again - and it seems his former protege is about to use the skills he taught her to scupper his latest heist. Comedy crime drama, starring Will Smith and Margot Robbie.

programme.title: Regression
programme.desc: In 1990, Minnesota detective Bruce Kenner finds evidence of a satanic cult when he investigates the case of John Gray, who admits to sexually abusing his 17-year-old daughter Angela, but has no recollection of it. Psychological thriller, starring Ethan Hawke, Emma Watson and David Thewlis.

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: A top-secret government agency has developed a seemingly unbreakable code - only for an autistic boy to crack it in an instant. Assassins succeed in gunning down his parents, but a maverick FBI agent investigating their deaths finds the child hiding in a closet, and resolves to shield him from the hitmen on his trail. Thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Alec Baldwin and Miko Hughes.

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: A retired secret agent applies his talents to the task of helping victims of injustice. When he witnesses a prostitute being beaten up by a pimp, he kills the man, an act that draws him into a battle to the death with a Russian crime syndicate. Action thriller based on the 1980s TV series, starring Denzel Washington and Chloe Grace Moretz.

programme.title: The Captive
programme.desc: A couple are plagued by the disappearance of their young daughter, eight years after she went missing, and a series of disturbing incidents seem to indicate that she is still alive. Thriller, starring Ryan Reynolds, Kevin Durand, Mireille Enos and Rosario Dawson.

programme.title: Regression
programme.desc: In 1990, Minnesota detective Bruce Kenner finds evidence of a satanic cult when he investigates the case of John Gray, who admits to sexually abusing his 17-year-old daughter Angela, but has no recollection of it. Psychological thriller, starring Ethan Hawke, Emma Watson and David Thewlis.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: A married lawyer has a one-night stand with a business associate while his wife and children are out of town. He hopes to keep his infidelity a secret, but she is determined to continue the relationship, and begins obsessively stalking him and his unsuspecting family. Thriller, starring Michael Douglas, Glenn Close and Anne Archer.

programme.title: Internal Affairs
programme.desc: A crooked cop uses his badge and uniform as a cover for his unsavoury money-making schemes and is prepared to murder anyone who stands in his way. A zealous investigator vows to bring him to justice, but the cunning detective responds by turning his adversary's wife against him. Crime thriller, starring Richard Gere, Andy Garcia, Laurie Metcalf, Nancy Travis and William Baldwin.(n)

programme.title: Falling Down
programme.desc: A stressed motorist cracks under the pressures of everyday life, and the day that started out with a simple journey to visit his estranged family turns into an increasingly violent trek across Los Angeles. Director Joel Schumacher's satirical urban thriller, starring Michael Douglas, Robert Duvall, Barbara Hershey, Rachel Ticotin and Frederic Forrest.(n)

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: A seemingly straightforward missing persons case draws a private investigator into a battle against the members of a child pornography ring, who are holding a teenager he has been hired to find. Thriller, starring John Schneider, Robyn Lively, Alex Rocco and Rudy Ramos.(n)

programme.title: The Conversation
programme.desc: An obsessive surveillance expert makes the unprofessional mistake of getting personally involved in a dangerous case. Francis Ford Coppola's thriller, starring Gene Hackman, John Cazale, Robert Duvall, Allen Garfield and Harrison Ford.(n)

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A freelance former US intelligence agent is recruited alongside a team of fellow mercenaries to take part in an international plot to capture a briefcase from a gang of criminals. However, after the mission is completed, one member of the crew decides to betray his equally ruthless comrades-in-arms - with inevitably explosive results. John Frankenheimer's action thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Jean Reno, Natascha McElhone, Sean Bean, Stellan Skarsgard and Jonathan Pryce.(n)

programme.title: Barely Lethal
programme.desc: A teenage secret agent longs to lead a normal life, so decides to fake her own death and enrol in a high school as an exchange student. However, she soon discovers that navigating teenage social hierarchy can be just as dangerous as international espionage. Action comedy, starring Hailee Steinfeld, Samuel L Jackson and Jessica Alba.(n)

programme.title: Marathon Man
programme.desc: A college undergraduate training for a marathon is drawn into a shady world of espionage by his secret agent brother and a Nazi war criminal searching for a cache of stolen diamonds - entangling the student in a plot involving kidnap, torture and political intrigue. John Schlesinger's thriller, starring Dustin Hoffman, Laurence Olivier and Roy Scheider. Based on the novel by William Goldman.(n)

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October
programme.desc: A Soviet submarine commander creates an international crisis by piloting his experimental nuclear vessel, which is invisible to sonar, toward the American coast. The US and Russian navies think he is planning to attack and set out to destroy the submarine, but a CIA analyst suspects he intends to defect to the West. Cold War thriller, based on Tom Clancy's novel, starring Sean Connery, Alec Baldwin and James Earl Jones.(n)

programme.title: Spooks: The Greater Good
programme.desc: A terrorist escapes custody during a prisoner handover when the convoy he is being transported in is attacked, leading to a CIA operative being killed and relations becoming frayed between British and American intelligence agencies. MI5 officer Will Holloway must team up with disgraced intelligence chief Harry Pearce to track him down before an imminent terrorist attack on London. Spy thriller, starring Kit Harington and Peter Firth.(n)

programme.title: Enemy of the State
programme.desc: A chance encounter with an old friend derails a successful lawyer's fast-track career, plunging him headlong into a deadly game of cat and mouse with relentless government agents capable of anticipating his every move. He quickly realises the only way to save his own life is to expose the truths his pursuers seem so intent on covering up, and seeks out a former intelligence agent to take them on at their own game. Thriller, starring Will Smith, Gene Hackman, Jon Voight and Lisa Bonet.(n)

programme.title: Taken
programme.desc: An American teenager travelling through Europe is abducted by a gang of sex traffickers. However, what the kidnappers do not realise is that the girl's father is a former CIA agent, who employs all his old skills as he searches for the criminals and tries to rescue his daughter. Thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Famke Janssen and Maggie Grace.(n)

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A freelance former US intelligence agent is recruited alongside a team of fellow mercenaries to take part in an international plot to capture a briefcase from a gang of criminals. However, after the mission is completed, one member of the crew decides to betray his equally ruthless comrades-in-arms - with inevitably explosive results. John Frankenheimer's action thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Jean Reno, Natascha McElhone, Sean Bean, Stellan Skarsgard and Jonathan Pryce.(n)

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: A doctor's wife recovering from a car accident is troubled by terrifying visions of a ghostly girl who seems to be asking for help from beyond the grave. While her husband thinks the experiences are the result of her recent trauma, a psychiatrist urges her to communicate with the spirit. Supernatural thriller, starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Harrison Ford, Diana Scarwid and Joe Morton.

programme.title: Batman & Robin
programme.desc: The caped crusader and his sidekick take on the villainous Mr Freeze, who plans to destroy Gotham City with an icy doomsday weapon unless his demands are met. The dynamic duo also have to contend with femme fatale Poison Ivy, who is determined to drive a wedge between them. Comic-book adventure, starring George Clooney, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Uma Thurman and Chris O'Donnell.

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond: Special
programme.desc: The making of the latest instalment in the sci-fi series, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto and Zoe Saldana.

programme.title: Masters of the Universe
programme.desc: The heroic warrior He-Man sets out to bring an end to the evil Skeletor's reign of terror, but is transported to Earth by a cosmic key, with his arch enemy's henchman in hot pursuit. Fantasy adventure, starring Dolph Lundgren, Frank Langella, Meg Foster and Billy Barty.

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond: Special
programme.desc: The making of the latest instalment in the sci-fi series, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto and Zoe Saldana.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Superman's home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey.

programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick
programme.desc: Fugitive Riddick evades capture by bounty hunters and steals their spacecraft, only to run into an even bigger threat - fanatical cult members on a sinister mission to kill or convert anyone who crosses their path as they seek galactic domination. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with Vin Diesel reprising his role from Pitch Black alongside Judi Dench, Alexa Davalos and Thandie Newton.

programme.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
programme.desc: The superhero team faces a threat from within when Iron Man creates an artificial intelligence to take their place protecting the world. The android grows resentful of his creators, and decides his mission is best accomplished by wiping out the human race. Meanwhile, two vengeful superpowered twins seek to turn the Avengers against each other. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Robert Downey Jr, Chris Hemsworth, Chris Evans and Scarlett Johansson.

programme.title: Masters of the Universe
programme.desc: The heroic warrior He-Man sets out to bring an end to the evil Skeletor's reign of terror, but is transported to Earth by a cosmic key, with his arch enemy's henchman in hot pursuit. Fantasy adventure, starring Dolph Lundgren, Frank Langella, Meg Foster and Billy Barty.

Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Superman's home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey.
